items.title: Hugging Face CEO says we’re in an ‘LLM bubble,’ not an AI bubble

items.title: AI data center provider Lambda raises whopping $1.5B after multibillion-dollar Microsoft deal
items.description: Lambda's new raise was a solid beat over the amount that deal-watchers say it was hoping to hit.

items.title: Meta wins antitrust trial as judge denies that it’s a monopoly
items.description: A federal judge ruled that Meta is not a monopoly in a lawsuit with the FTC.

items.title: Monarch Tractor sued over tractors that were ‘unable to operate autonomously’

items.title: Toyota keeps betting on hybrid vehicles in the US
items.description: The investment follows an announcement last week that Toyota will spend up to $10 billion over the next five years in the United States.
